traits.name: Impression: Chaos
traits.effect: Value spontaneity and personal freedom over oder

traits.name: Rapt Attention
traits.effect: Handles tasks with heightened effeciency, reducing completion time.

skills.name: Deadly Blossom
skills.description: Deals Pyro Damage to enemies in front and inflict [Laceration]. [Laceration]: When under the influence of [Laceration], every time the enemy takes ranged weapon damage, the [Lacerated Wound] is increased by 1. When the [Laceration] duration ends, deals Pyro Damage equivalent to [Lacerated Wound] count x [Laceration] dMG to the enemy once.

skills.name: Gunpowder Revelry
skills.description: Switches the ranged weapon to [Hansel and Gretel]. In this state, Lynn can shoot and use skills, but can only move using [Deadly Blossom]. Shooting deals damage to all enemies in front, during which Lynn gains 1 stack that increases Lynn's ATK Speed every 0.2s, up to 35 stacks. Using [Hansel and Gretel] continuously consumes Sanity, during which Lynn is immune to Hitsun when taking damage. When Sanity drops to 0 or the skill is used again, sheathes [Hansel and Gretel].

skills.name: Tactical Rapid Fire
skills.description: When not shooting, Lynn gains 1 stack of [Preload] per second, up to 6 stacks. When shooting, consumes al stacks of [Preload] to gain [Supressing Fire] for a period of time. [Supressing Fire]: Increases the damage based on the number of the consumsed [Preload] stacks. Cannot gain [Preload] stack during [Suppresing Fire].
